channel.title: Bootstrap5 on Anthony Ngo
channel.description: Recent content in Bootstrap5 on Anthony Ngo

item.title: LearnFS.xyz
item.description: A webapp to help users learn ASL Fingerspelling alphabet. As a perpetual student, polyglot in progress, and someone who has lived abroad, I’ve come to love learning languages (which also extends to programming languages), and that’s why I created this project.

item.title: Portfolio v2
item.description: A multipage portfolio built with Hugo and Bootstrap5. I built this because I needed to update my work and wanted to create a multipage site, and I used Hugo because it simplified blogging and updating content. (I learned that singlepagers provide less friction for visitors. Each click to a different page becomes a potential deterrent. V2’s design included hover effects, which didn’t perform well on mobile.)
